item.title: Coursiv.io EXPOSED — Don’t Get Tricked by This AI Training Scam!
item.description: Our team investigates Coursiv.io — a viral AI course brand drawing serious complaints about hidden charges, refund refusal, and aggressive marketing claims. Discover how users were misled, what patterns point to deceptive business practices, and how to protect yourself from similar online training scams.
